title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete, copy, show, create.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama: same feature set as Python SDK but for Node/Bun/Deno.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, chat models, and embedders inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama: markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama: strongly-typed async client with tokio, supports chat, generate, pull, list, delete.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama: chat REPL with history, syntax highlighting, model switching, markdown.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot plugin that proxies to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI: VS Code & JetBrains support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: FastAPI backend, Chroma vector DB, Ollama embeddings & chat, React frontend.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats via Ollama: slash commands, thread support, model picker, moderation hooks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production Helm chart for Ollama: GPU node selector, PVC for model cache, ingress, Prometheus metrics.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin: ask Ollama to explain, refactor, or generate code inside the editor with customizable prompts.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama: supports chat, generate, embeddings, model management; includes ASP.NET Core sample.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rustica
summary: Experimental Rust rewrite of the Ollama server itself (not just a client) for smaller binary & static builds.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin: run local LLMs via Ollama to summarize notes, generate flashcards, or answer vault questions.
